ch0146_00_corn/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. It’s nice
to see you.
ch0146_00_corn/0101_0701_02_10:
Today, as always, let’s aim to be the best
sync pairs we can be!
ch0146_00_corn/7101_0701_01_10:
Cilan, Chili, and I used to run the Striaton
City Gym together.
ch0146_00_corn/7101_0701_02_10:
It was nice to have partners I could
count on...
ch0146_00_corn/7101_0701_03_10:
The problem was, the three of us together
made up one full-fledged Trainer. Our Gym
couldn’t function if one of us wasn’t there.
ch0146_00_corn/7102_0701_01_10:
My brothers and I are the triplets of
Striaton City, and we each specialize in
a different type.
ch0146_00_corn/7102_0701_02_10:
What style do you prefer? Something
balanced? Or something specialized?
ch0146_00_corn/7103_0701_01_10:
No matter the situation, I strive to keep a
cool head. That’s my style.
ch0146_00_corn/7103_0701_02_10:
I try to stay cool even as a waiter—not just
when battling.
ch0146_00_corn/7104_0701_02_10:
We may fight over small things, which is
annoying...
ch0146_00_corn/7104_0701_03_10: But when we’re apart, sometimes I miss that.
ch0146_00_corn/7104_0701_04_10:
Well...I’d never tell them that, even if they
tried to drag it out of me.
ch0146_00_corn/7105_0701_01_10:
I need to be strong enough to manage things
even when Cilan and Chili aren’t around.
ch0146_00_corn/7105_0701_02_10:
That’s how I used to think, anyway. But it’s
important to rely on others. You taught me
that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0146_00_corn/1701_0701_01_10:
I put some thought into something useful to
give you.
ch0146_00_corn/1701_0702_01_10:
It’d make me happy to see you use it—just
as I imagined.
ch0146_00_corn/2501_0701_01_10:
Between me and my brothers, I think I,
Cress, am the strongest.
ch0146_00_corn/2501_0701_02_10:
But sometimes in my confidence, I let my
guard down—and get burned for it.
ch0146_00_corn/2501_0701_03_10:
When that happens, my brothers are there to
cover for me.
ch0146_00_corn/2501_0702_01_10:
Our ability to cover each other’s weaknesses
may be a key to our strength.
ch0146_00_corn/2501_0702_02_10: I hope you too can trust me as an ally.
ch0146_00_corn/2511_0701_01_10:
My goal now is to become a full-fledged
Gym Leader, even on my own.
ch0146_00_corn/2511_0701_02_10: As for a first step to achieve that...
ch0146_00_corn/2511_0701_03_10:
I think you recognizing me as a worthy
opponent would be a start.
ch0146_00_corn/2511_0702_01_10:
As for whether I see you as a worthy
opponent... Well, I’ll let you figure that out.
ch0146_00_corn/2511_0702_02_10: Please continue to watch me grow!
ch0146_00_corn/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. Would you like a refreshing
glass of water to help you wake up?
ch0146_00_corn/3003_0701_01_10:
You and your partner get along so well.
It’s almost as if you’re siblings.
ch0146_00_corn/3005_0701_01_10:
I feel so relaxed from this fresh evening
breeze...
